description_for_model: An API that provides AI-powered chat summarization and insights, resume ATS scoring and optimization, and content generation. Use this plugin when the user wants to summarize conversations, analyze chat sentiment, score or improve resumes, or generate text content.

conversation_starters: What insights can you find in this chat?
Score my resume against this job description
Help me improve my resume for a senior engineer role
Generate a professional email about project updates

functions.name: summarizeChat
functions.description: Summarize a chat conversation into key points and action items.

functions.name: extractInsights
functions.description: Extract sentiment, topics, entities, risks, and follow-ups from a conversation.

functions.name: scoreResume
functions.description: Score a resume (0-100) with ATS analysis, matched/missing skills.

functions.name: improveResume
functions.description: Optimize a resume with improved bullets, keywords, and formatting.

functions.name: generateContent
